verbs.description: le’veon bell [V: may] not show up in 2018 after learning new info the nfl collective bargaining agreement is a complicated animal and apparently even le’veon bell is still learning the ins and outs of it according to one report a new piece of information the star running back learned about his own situation this week has him contemplating not reporting to the pittsburgh steelers at all in 2018 a source told mark kaboly of the athletic that bell is not a lock to sign his franchise tender prior to the nov mark kaboly yardbarker bell nfl national football league pittsburgh steelers cbs sports
